title: Metropolis Job Board
section: Ready to Find Your Next Adventure?
text:
Ready to Find Your Next Adventure?
Whether you‚Äôre a hero seeking a sidekick position or a villain looking to expand your organization, we have the perfect opportunity for you.
Create Account Learn More

Hero Profile Images

Template Prompt for Heroes
Create a professional headshot of a superhero, digital art style, clean background, 
[specific details below], square format 800x800px, suitable for profile picture

Variations:
1. "Mighty Marvel" - muscular hero, red and gold color scheme, confident pose
2. "Tech Knight" - sleek tech-enhanced hero, blue and silver armor, holographic HUD
3. "Mystic Mind" - mystical hero, purple robes, glowing eyes, ethereal effects
4. "Quick Silver" - speedster hero, aerodynamic suit, lightning effects

Villain Profile Images

Template Prompt for Villains
Create a dramatic portrait of a supervillain, digital art style, dark atmosphere, 
[specific details below], square format 800x800px, suitable for profile picture

Variations:
1. "Dr. Doomsday" - mad scientist, lab coat, glowing tech, ominous lighting
2. "Shadow Master" - stealthy villain, dark suit, hidden face, smoke effects
3. "The Trickster" - chaotic villain, bright colors, mischievous expression
4. "Nightmare Lord" - supernatural villain, dark energy, cosmic background

Organization Logos

Hero Organizations
Create a professional logo for a superhero organization, clean modern design,
[specific details below], transparent background, 400x400px

Variations:
1. Justice League - shield design, stars and lightning motif
2. Hero Academy - educational symbol, wings and book design
3. Guardian Corps - protective emblem, globe and shield motif


Villain Organizations
Create a menacing logo for a villain organization, sophisticated design,
[specific details below], transparent background, 400x400px

Variations:
1. Legion of Doom - skull motif, dark color scheme
2. Evil Industries Inc. - corporate evil, sharp angles
3. Chaos Syndicate - abstract destructive elements

Job Listing Images

Hero Positions
Create an illustration representing a superhero job, modern minimal style,
[specific details below], 16:9 ratio, 1200x675px

Variations:
1. Sidekick Position - training scene, mentor-student dynamic
2. City Guardian - cityscape patrol scene
3. Crisis Response - emergency response scene


Villain Positions
Create an illustration representing a villain job, dramatic style,
[specific details below], 16:9 ratio, 1200x675px

Variations:
1. Henchman Position - group of minions scene
2. Evil Scientist - laboratory scene
3. Chaos Agent - urban mayhem scene

Background Images

Header Backgrounds
Create a superhero cityscape background, subtle design for text overlay,
[specific details below], 1920x300px

Variations:
1. Day Scene - bright, hopeful city view
2. Night Scene - dramatic, moody atmosphere
3. Action Scene - distant battle effects


Form Backgrounds
Create a subtle pattern background for forms, low contrast for readability,
[specific details below], tileable pattern, 400x400px

Variations:
1. Hero Pattern - subtle shield and star motifs
2. Villain Pattern - subtle dark geometric shapes
3. Neutral Pattern - abstract professional design

Icon Set

Navigation Icons
Create a set of minimal icons for website navigation, consistent style,
[specific details below], 64x64px each, transparent background

Set includes:
1. Home Icon - house with cape
2. Jobs Icon - briefcase with lightning bolt
3. Heroes Icon - mask and shield
4. Villains Icon - dramatic mask
5. Submit Icon - paper plane with trail
6. Instructions Icon - book with lightning bolt

Usage Guidelines

All images should maintain consistent style and quality
Use appropriate color schemes:

Heroes: Bright, bold colors
Villains: Dark, dramatic colors
UI Elements: Neutral, professional tones

File Naming Convention:

Hero profiles: hero_[name].png
Villain profiles: villain_[name].png
Organizations: org_[name].png
Job listings: job_[type]_[number].png
Backgrounds: bg_[type]_[number].png
Icons: icon_[name].png

Image Optimization:

Compress all images for web use
Maintain transparency where specified
Ensure consistent dimensions
Keep file sizes under 1MB

Accessibility:

Include alt text descriptions
Maintain sufficient contrast
Avoid flashing or strobing effects

Technical Specifications

Profile Images:

Dimensions: 800x800px
Format: PNG with transparency
Resolution: 72 DPI
Color Space: sRGB

Logos:

Dimensions: 400x400px
Format: PNG with transparency
Resolution: 72 DPI
Color Space: sRGB

Job Listings:

Dimensions: 1200x675px
Format: JPG
Resolution: 72 DPI
Color Space: sRGB

Backgrounds:

Dimensions: As specified per type
Format: PNG/JPG as appropriate
Resolution: 72 DPI
Color Space: sRGB

Icons:

Dimensions: 64x64px
Format: PNG with transparency
Resolution: 72 DPI
Color Space: sRGB

title: Update Instructions
text:
How to Update the Job Board

        
          1. File Structure
          
            shjp/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ _data/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ heroes.yml      # Heroes directory data
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ villains.yml    # Villains directory data
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ jobs.yml        # Job listings data
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ assets/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ images/         # Profile and listing images
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ pages/
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ heroes.qmd      # Heroes page template
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ villains.qmd    # Villains page template
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ jobs.qmd        # Jobs page template
          
        

        
          2. Data File Formats
          
          heroes.yml Format
          
            - id: hero_1
  name: "Hero Name"
  powers: ["Power1", "Power2"]
  experience: "5 years"
  location: "City Name"
  status: "available"
  specialties:
    - "Specialty 1"
    - "Specialty 2"
  image: "hero1.jpg"
          

          villains.yml Format
          
            - id: villain_1
  name: "Villain Name"
  specialty: "Evil Specialty"
  threat_level: "global"
  base: "Secret Location"
  status: "recruiting"
  seeking:
    - "Position 1"
    - "Position 2"
  image: "villain1.jpg"
          

          jobs.yml Format
          
            - id: job_1
  title: "Job Title"
  organization: "Organization Name"
  type: "hero/villain/support"
  location: "Job Location"
  experience_required: "X years"
  skills_required:
    - "Skill 1"
    - "Skill 2"
  benefits:
    - "Benefit 1"
    - "Benefit 2"
  status: "open/closed"
          
        

        
          3. Adding New Entries
          
          Step-by-Step Process:
          
            Navigate to the appropriate YAML file in the _data directory
            Copy an existing entry as a template
            Modify all fields with new information
            Ensure all required fields are filled
            Maintain proper YAML indentation
            Save the file
          

          
            Note: Always maintain the exact indentation and format structure to prevent errors.
          
        

        
          4. Updating Existing Entries
          
          To update an entry:
          
            Locate the entry by its ID in the appropriate YAML file
            Modify only the fields that need updating
            Keep all other fields unchanged
            Save the file
          

          
            Important: Do not change the ID of existing entries as they may be referenced elsewhere.
          
        

        
          5. Image Guidelines
          
          Image Requirements:
          
            Format: JPG or PNG
            Size: Maximum 1MB
            Dimensions: 800x800 pixels (square) recommended
            Resolution: 72 DPI minimum
          

          Image Naming Convention:
          
            hero_[id].jpg    # For hero images
villain_[id].jpg # For villain images
job_[id].jpg     # For job listing images
          
        

        
          6. Best Practices
          
          
            Always backup data files before making major changes
            Use clear, descriptive names for all entries
            Keep descriptions concise but informative
            Update status fields promptly
            Remove or archive outdated entries
            Test changes in a development environment first
          
        

        
          7. Need Help?
          
          If you encounter any issues or need assistance:
          
            Check the error messages in the build logs
            Verify YAML syntax using a YAML validator
            Contact the technical team for support

title: Post a Job
text:
Post Your Job Opening
        
        
          
          
            Organization Details
            
              Organization Name *
              
            
            
            
              Organization Type *
              
                Select organization type...
                Hero Organization
                Villain Organization
                Neutral Organization
                Government Agency
              
            
            
            
              Base Location *
              
            
          

          
          
            Job Details
            
              Position Title *
              
            
            
            
              Job Type *
              
                Select job type...
                Hero
                Sidekick
                Villain
                Henchman
                Support Staff
                Intern
              
            
            
            
              Experience Required *
              
                Select experience level...
                Entry Level (0-2 years)
                Intermediate (3-5 years)
                Senior (5+ years)
                Veteran (10+ years)
              
            
            
            
              Required Powers/Skills (comma-separated) *
              
              e.g., Flight, Super Strength, Hacking, Evil Laugh
            
          

          
          
            Job Description
            
              Detailed Description *

              Benefits
              
            
          

          
          
            Contact Information
            
              Contact Person *
              
            
            
            
              Contact Email *
              
            
            
            
              Contact Phone

              Keep Organization Anonymous
